title: Hiragana Quiz - Set 4
description: Test your knowledge of hiragana characters with this quiz. Identify the correct hiragana character for each given pronunciation.

items.question: ま
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a curve and a short horizontal line.

items.question: み
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'mi' with a curve at the top.

items.question: む
items.hint: Looks like the letter 'mu' with a curve at the top.

items.question: め
items.hint: Combination of three strokes: a curve, a short horizontal line, and a longer diagonal line.

items.question: も
items.hint: Combination of three strokes: a curve, a short horizontal line, and a longer diagonal line.

items.question: や
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'ya' with a short horizontal line and a curve.

items.question: ゆ
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'yu' with a curve at the top.

items.question: よ
items.hint: Combination of three strokes: a curve, a short horizontal line, and a longer diagonal line.

items.question: ら
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a short diagonal line and a longer diagonal line.

items.question: り
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'ri' with a curve at the top.
